chunk:
Dhc Moisturize Concentrated Eye Cream (2020 formulation)

Brand: DHC

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: WATER/AQUA/EAU, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) FRUIT OIL, STEARIC ACID, HYDROGENATED PALM OIL, SQUALANE, GLYCERIN, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, POLYSORBATE 60, LEUCONOSTOC/RADISH ROOT FERMENT FILTRATE, CETYL ALCO

FILTRATE, CETYL ALCOHOL, SORBITAN STEARATE, ALCOHOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT, CARBOMER, MAGNESIUM ALUMINUM SILICATE, DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE, TOCOPHEROL, BIOSACCHARIDE GUM-1, AESCULUS HIPPOCASTANUM (HORSE CHESTNUT) SEED EXTRACT, SODIUM HYALURONATE, SASA VEITCHII LEAF EXTRACT, PANAX GINSE

EXTRACT, PANAX GINSENG ROOT EXTRACT, CUCUMIS SATIVUS (CUCUMBER) FRUIT EXTRACT, ROYAL JELLY EXTRACT, CITRIC ACID

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
